backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with job postings, applications, contact submissions, and user profiles, plus initial job data structures and types.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration that removes non-placeholder job postings and returns an updated actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for various frontend files and components.
frontend/CUSTOM_DOMAIN.md: Documentation describing how to configure the glitchip.in custom domain via Cloudflare for the IC canister.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining color tokens, variables, and dark mode settings.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint that loads fonts, icons, and boots the main React app.
frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains: Specifies glitchip.in as the IC custom domain.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the router, theme provider, React Query client, and defines all top-level routes.
Layout wrapper that renders header, footer, and page transitions around children.
frontend/src/components/PageTransition.t: Applies opacity-based transitions between route changes with reduced-motion support.
frontend/src/components/SafeImage.tsx: Image component that swaps to a gradient placeholder on load failure.
frontend/src/components/SectionReveal.ts: Intersection-observer-based component revealing sections with motion‑aware animations.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the site's footer with company info, service links, social icons, and a dynamic copyright year.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Implements a responsive site header with logo, navigation links, and mobile menu using a sheet drawer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Returns whether the user prefers reduced motion by listening to the relevant media query.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching jobs, job details, contact info, and submitting applications or forms via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables, base styles, motion-reduction rules, and custom utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/CareersPage.tsx: Implements a careers page listing jobs and providing a detailed multi-section job application form with resume upload and dynamic education/work experience fields.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact form with validation and submission plus company contact details and a styled hero section.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage with hero content, service highlights, stats, and promotional sections using animations and images.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Shows a products landing page with a hero section and 'coming soon' placeholder content for future product listings.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Defines the services page featuring detailed service descriptions, capabilities, deliverables, and engagement models.
frontend/src/pages/TermsAndConditionsPag: Presents the terms and conditions for application submission inside a styled card with multiple policy sections.
frontend/src/pages/WhyUsPage.tsx: React page rendering the Why Us section with hero, differentiators grid, and process steps using UI components and animations.
frontend/src/utils/jobId.ts: Provides job ID validation and an error message enforcing 6–7 uppercase alphanumeric characters.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing parameters from hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, layout, animations, and fonts with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file storing version info, scope summary, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature definitions.
